name: Bubbles (itch) (Loam)
description:
A puzzle game about collecting bubbles! The goal of the game is to collect as many bubbles as you can with one line. Play through hand crafted challenges, an endless mode, or make your own levels with the level editor under 'Extras'!

Remember:
- In a level with 4 bubbles, collecting 1 bubble then 3 bubbles bubble will be worth more than collecting 2 bubbles twice.
- You can cancel a line with right-click

Warning: Progress isn't saved in-browser!


Credits links

Music: Wisps of Whorles - Kevin MacLeod

Dev: Me! (loam.net)

Source: https://github.com/LoamNet/net.loam.bubbles
